name: Stained Glass
description:
You are a young lawyer at Hillcroft & Snell, a medium sized law based in the city. After graduating from your elite university, members of the Somersett Club, an elite private social club with connections to the university and strong political ties, put in a good word for you.

You’re doing well at Hillcroft & Snell, establishing yourself as a successful defender in high profile criminal cases. You have a home in a well-to-do suburb in the state’s green belt, and a beautiful wife named Jenny who is successful in her job as an interior designer.

Your only disappointment is that Jenny is unable to conceive a child, a child that you desperately want.

Other than that, your life is perfect, and perfectly mundane—until you receive an unexpected text message from an old friend and member of The Somersett Club.

You haven’t been an active member of the club for years; however, it turns out, they’ve been watching you. They want to make you an offer, an offer that could change your life. And all you have to do is make a choice.

A short visual novel in which every decision leads to a different outcome...

* This visual novel describes an incident of self-harm.

* This is our first time using Renpy. The project was created in order to test our storytelling skills using the program.

* We're working on a new and much bigger project that we hope to complete by the end of the year.
